overview: When the world is threatened by a diabolical mind-control plot, who you gonna call? How about VCA Ultra girl, Tawny Roberts? She stars as a secret agent Double O Blonde, the only international super spy smart enough, pretty enough and sexy enough to save the world from evil. Double O gets called into action after a secret agent disappears while on assignment in Morocco and a mysterious sex-selling ring evades the local vice squad. Agent Double O Blonde and her team of international super spies can make the world safe for pornography and pornography safe for the world.
title: Double O Blonde
